Text:
I didn't know this was ever cracked?

Thank you.

Games crashes always at the same place in the "Chase by V-rex" level.
I tried to remove game and download again to reinstall, same issue :(
Too bad, i began to like this old game .... 

Thanks anyway....

Confirmed. The game always crashes at the "Chased by V-Rex" level, after you climb the vertical wall and follow the river. I tried running the game in compatibility mode for XP or Vista to see if this would somehow fix it, but it didn't work.

I don't know if it's an unpatched critical bug in the original game, that's gotten worse in Win Vista/7, or a crack bug, but it does stop game progress at that point.

Thanks for sharing, anyway :)
hey guys, IF youv expirienced a crashes in that level, use low quality pixel of the video... choose as directx8 not directx9, then 800x600 resolution.. then the game work fine! iv try it and tested!

if youv expirienced a crush in that level, use low quality pixel of the video.. use directx8 not directx9, then use 800x600 resolution, the game will continue, no crush or error in that level anymore..

plz help!!i can't even started it.all i can see is black screen when starting the game.it frozen right at the beginning.i look around on the net, and i think it has st to do with the starforce protection.please help
